## Rembrandt

This Rmarkdown document will illustrate some of the features of the REMBRANDT R package.  

Rembrandt can be installed using the following code:

```{r eval = F}
library(devtools)
install_github("MilesLab/Rembrandt")
```

After Rembrandt is installed, we can load in the packages as below. 

```{r}
library(Rembrandt)
```

Rembrant includes several files in the package.  We can identify them as below.  

```{r}
list.files(system.file("extdata", package = "Rembrandt"))
```
